ActQuarantine Act
SubjectMinimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order (Quarantine, Isolation and Other Obligations)
PrecisMINIMIZING THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19 IN CANADA ORDER (QUARANTINE, ISOLATION AND OTHER OBLIGATIONS) in order to (1) support Canadaâ€™s continued focus on reducing the introduction and further spread of COVID-19 by decreasing the risk of importing cases from outside the country; (2) permit the option of presenting a negative antigen test in order to meet applicable pre-arrival testing requirements; (3) require fully vaccinated asylum claimants without a valid pre-arrival test to undergo testing and quarantine until the receipt of a negative test or the expiry of the quarantine period; (4) remove certain conditions for unvaccinated children under 12 entering Canada with a fully vaccinated parent or guardian; and (5) extend the duration of the measures until March 31, 2022.
